column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Drinks were delicious. I'm not a whisky drinker but had to try their specialty. 38 special was like a tasty and sweet Manhattan and sweet tea was just like it sounds. I'd get them both again. I had the veggie/black-eyed pea sandwich. It was delicious and filling. I loved it and will be back for it. Service was wonderful. We had Jose who was so kind and positive
column2: as well as super knowledgeable. Atmosphere was upbeat and fun. The clientele was very diverse but it wasn't a pickup scene
